title: You 2.0: Decide Already!
description: For the last episode in our You 2.0 series, we bring you a favorite conversation with Harvard researcher Dan Gilbert. He explains why we're bad at predicting our future happiness, how that affects our decision making, and why we're actually happier after making a decision that feels irrevocable.
author: ideas@hiddenbrain.org (Hidden Brain Media)
